excel_com_enabled.name: Excel COM Operations
excel_com_enabled.description: Windows-only Excel macro execution via COM interface

auto_archive_enabled.name: Auto-Archive Old Records
auto_archive_enabled.description: Automatically archive deals/contacts older than configured threshold
auto_archive_enabled.impact: Records older than 365 days will be moved to archive files

experimental_ui_enabled.name: Experimental UI Features
experimental_ui_enabled.description: Beta frontend features (new charts, layouts, components)
experimental_ui_enabled.impact: Unlocks experimental UI components and features
